result.markdown:
# BA-Bipartite Examples

Simulate BIP-BA data.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(1)

time <- 10
params_bip_true <- list(
  mu = 0.5,
  K = 0.5,
  beta = 0.5,
  beta_edges = 2,
  lambda_new = 3.5
)

sim <- sim_hawkesNet(
  params = params_bip_true,
  T_end = time,
  mark_type = "ba_bip"
)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Simulation took 0.25 seconds"
```


:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Bipartite colouring
col_map <- c(
  event = "#377EB8",
  perp  = "#E41A1C"
)
roles <- network::get.vertex.attribute(sim$net, "role")
cols <- col_map[roles]

plot(sim$net, vertex.col = cols)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](examples_ba_bip_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
print(paste("Number of simulated nodes:", nrow(sim$ev$nodes)))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Number of simulated nodes: 142"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
paste("Number of simulated edges:", nrow(sim$ev$edges))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Number of simulated edges: 144"
```


:::

```{.r .cell-code}
paste("Number of simulated events:", sim$events$n)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Number of simulated events: 35"
```


:::
:::


Fit BIP-BA data.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
params_bip_init <- list(
  mu = 1,
  K = 1,
  beta = 1,
  beta_edges = 1,
  lambda_new = 3.5
)

fit <- fit_hawkesNet(
      ev = sim$ev,
      params_init = params_bip_init,
      mark_type = "ba_bip"
    )
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] "Fitting took 22.22 seconds"
```


:::
:::


Parameter values on the fitted scale:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
unlist(fit$par)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
        mu          K       beta beta_edges lambda_new 
 1.1165440  0.4010628  0.3705936  1.8484052  3.0572086 
```


:::
:::


Parameter values on the transformed scale:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
fit$fit$par
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
        mu          K       beta beta_edges lambda_new 
 0.1102382 -0.9136372 -0.9926493  0.6143232  1.1175023 
```


:::
:::
